content.question:
Directions: You will participate in a simulated conversation. You will hear a series of 6 questions or statements; after each question or statement, it is your turn to speak. You will have 20 seconds to record each response. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. When you are ready to begin, select the Continue button.

You will have a conversation with Ms. Wang, the principal of a Chinese language school, about assisting in the school’s cultural classes on weekends.
Prompt 1

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
